panels.description: Average latency in microseconds for the WAFL filesystem to process write request to the volume; not including request processing or network communication time.

panels.title: SVM Throughput

panels.description: Number of read/write/other operations per second from the volume.
panels.title: SVM IOPs

panels.description: This panel displays the top $TopResources SVMs based on the space used across their volumes.
panels.title: Top $TopResources SVMs by Volume Space Usage

panels.description: This panel displays the top $TopResources SVMs based on the logical space used across their volumes.

targets.expr:
sum by (datacenter, cluster, svm) (volume_space_logical_used{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster", svm=~"$SVM", style=~"flexvol|flexgroup"})
and on(datacenter, cluster, svm)
topk(
    $TopResources,
    sum by (datacenter, cluster, svm) (
        avg_over_time(volume_space_logical_used{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster", svm=~"$SVM", style=~"flexvol|flexgroup"}[3h])
    )
)

panels.title: Top $TopResources SVMs by Logical Space Usage Across Volumes

panels.description:
dispatch_latency: Latency by ONTAP to select a scanner and until the selected scanner pulls the request.

scan_latency: Latency by the scanner after it pulls the request and until it responds, including scan time of the AV software.

Note, the scan latency is per request (file) and not per IOP.
panels.title: Virus Scan Latency

panels.description:
scan_request_dispatched_rate: Number of virus-scanning requests sent from Data ONTAP to the Vscan servers per second.

scan_noti_received_rate: Number of virus-scanning requests received back by Data ONTAP from the Vscan servers per second.

If (dispatched > received) then requests are failing or delayed and deeper troubleshooting is recommended.

Note, the rate is per request (file) and not per IOP.
panels.title: Virus Scan Requests

panels.description: connections_active: Number of active connections from ONTAP nodes to virus scan servers.
panels.title: Virus Scan Connections Active

panels.title: Average QoS Latency

panels.description: Qos total throughput.

panels.description: This field is the workload's rate of operations that completed during the measurement interval; measured per second.

panels.description: This is the average response time for read requests that were initiated by the workload.

panels.description: This is the average response time for write requests that were initiated by the workload.

panels.description: This is the amount of data read per second from the filer by the workload.

panels.description: This is the amount of data written per second to the filer by the workload.

panels.description: This is the rate of this workload's read operations that completed during the measurement interval.
panels.title: QoS Read IOPs

panels.description: This is the workload's write operations that completed during the measurement interval; measured per second.
panels.title: QoS Write IOPs

panels.description: This is the average response time for read/write requests that were initiated by the workload.

targets.expr:
avg by (svm) (qos_read_latency{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",svm=~"$SVM"})
and
topk($TopResources, avg by (svm) (avg_over_time(qos_read_latency{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",svm=~"$SVM"}[3h] @ end())))

avg by (svm) (qos_write_latency{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",svm=~"$SVM"})
and
topk($TopResources, avg by (svm) (avg_over_time(qos_write_latency{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",svm=~"$SVM"}[3h] @ end())))

panels.title: Top $TopResources SVMs by QoS Latency

panels.description: This is the amount of data read/written per second from the filer by the workload.

targets.expr:
sum by (svm) (qos_read_data{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",svm=~"$SVM"})
and
topk($TopResources, sum by (svm) (avg_over_time(qos_read_data{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",svm=~"$SVM",svm!=""}[3h] @ end())))

sum by (svm) (qos_write_data{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",svm=~"$SVM"})
and
topk($TopResources, sum by (svm) (avg_over_time(qos_write_data{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",svm=~"$SVM",svm!=""}[3h] @ end())))

panels.title: Top $TopResources SVMs by QoS Throughput

panels.description: This is the rate of this workload's read/write operations that completed during the measurement interval.

targets.expr:
sum by (svm) (qos_read_ops{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",svm=~"$SVM"})
and
topk($TopResources, sum by (svm) (avg_over_time(qos_read_ops{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",svm=~"$SVM",svm!=""}[3h] @ end())))

sum by (svm) (qos_write_ops{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",svm=~"$SVM"})
and
topk($TopResources, sum by (svm) (avg_over_time(qos_write_ops{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",svm=~"$SVM",svm!=""}[3h] @ end())))
